instructions.text: Arrange the racks in the upper and lower thirds of the oven. Preheat to 425F.
Cut sweet potatoes lengthwise. Cut halves into 1/4-inch fries. Transfer to bowl.
Mix corn starch, kosher salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, and paprika in a small bowl. Mix and sprinkle over potatoes. Toss with hands until coated, then slowly add oil.
Spray cooking sheets and arrange potatoes in a single layer. Leave space around each piece.
Bake 25 minutes, flip, and bake 25 again until browned and fragrant. Sprinkle with sea salt after removing to ensure it sticks. Let cool 5 minutes.
